channel.title: Historrry :: Cap'n Hugo Relearrrn Theme
channel.description: Changelog 6.2.0 (2024-08-22) Enhancements [feature][change] anchor: add opt'n t' scroll into view #886 [feature] theme: support fer GitHub styled alerts #885 Fixes [bug] arrownav: avoid rude event handl'n fer form elements #887 Maintenance [task] 404: move styles t' separate file #889 6.
